alert.server_connection_failed: Unable to connect to the server

button.close_current_page_translation: Close translation of the current page

tip.end_jump: Reached the last page, scrolling down will jump to the next chapter
tip.exit: Reached the last page, scrolling down will exit
tip.start_jump: Reached the first page, scrolling up will jump to the previous chapter

alert.img_not_found_dir: No image files or compressed files containing image files in the folder
alert.img_not_found_files: Please select an image file or a compressed file containing image files

pwa.install_md:
### Tired of opening this webpage every time?
If you wish to:
1. Have an independent window, as if using local software
1. Add to the local compressed file opening method for easy direct opening
1. Use offline
### Welcome to install this page as a PWA app on your computerüòÉüëç
pwa.tip_md:
# ComicRead PWA
Read **local** comics using [ComicRead](https://github.com/hymbz/ComicReadScript) reading mode.
---
### Drag and drop image files, folders, or compressed files directly to start reading

option.click_page_turn_lr_reverse: Reverse left and right click areas
option.first_page_fill: Enable first page fill by default
option.reverse_page_turn_key: Swap left and right page-turning keys
option.show_comment: Show comments on the end page

translation.cotrans_tip:
Using the interface provided by Cotrans to translate images, which is maintained by its maintainer at their own expense.

When multiple people use it at the same time, they need to queue and wait. If the waiting queue reaches its limit, uploading new images will result in an error. Please try again after a while.

So please mind the frequency of use.

It is highly recommended to use your own locally deployed project, as it does not consume server resources and does not require queuing.

add_feature.open_link_new_page: open links in a new page

ehentai.fetch_img_page_source_fail: failed to get the source code of the image page
ehentai.fetch_img_page_url_fail: failed to get the image page address from the detail page
ehentai.fetch_img_url_fail: failed to get the image address from the image page
ehentai.html_changed_load_fail: The web page structure has changed, unable to load comics
ehentai.html_changed_nhentai_fail: The web page structure has changed, the function to associate nhentai comics is not working properly
ehentai.nhentai_fail: Matching failed, please refresh after confirming login to {{nhentai}}

nhentai.fetch_next_page_fail: Failed to get next page of comic data

simple.auto_read_mode_message: "Auto enter reading mode" is enabled by default

status.error-lang: The target language is not supported by the chosen translator
status.error-translating: Did not get any text back from the text translation service

tip.get_translator_list_error: Error occurred while getting the list of available translation services
